title: Professional Portfolio
description_short: A website showcasing my professional work.
description_full: I can imagine every web developer feels the need to create a personal website at least once.

When I began to plan for mine, I knew I wanted to have the site showcase many types of information in an easy-to-follow, but interesting manner.  The categories and styles I settled upon are the ones you can see here.
Please use the Github link to access more project documentation.
